page.title: 13LLANDERLO Tourism
page.content: Thre is a licensed restaurant The Plough on A40 64.24 of a high standard. One sheep farmer has turned his house Maesydderwen 66.23 into a country Inn and has a licensed restaurant. One building has produced 12 flatets, some for permanent occupiers and others for holiday makers. Bryn Ammon Hunt meets here. There is private fishing in pool. Game fishing is also available in River Towey (salmon, migratory sea trout, known locally as Srwin and river trout). A large farmhouse Closglas 64.24 on A40 offer excellent bed and breakfast during summer.
